name: Radar Simulator App
description: iOS app that takes ads-b data and displays it in a 4th Gen Radar "b" scope format, and RWR. Intended to be used in T-38 Training, to give earlier exposure to sensor manipulation for pilots in fighter training.

name: Heart Rate as marker for Pilot Training Performance
description: Investigated the use of Heart Rate of student pilots to determine their capacity during UPT. Was discontinued in 2023 due to other constraints.

name: Eye tracking as marker for Pilot Training Performance
description: Investigating how to use eye tracking in VR headsets for improved student debriefing, as well as their capacity for advanced training.
